items.name: animated-menu
items.title: Animated Menu
items.description: Animated menu, with orchestrated children animation, fully customizable.

items.name: calculator
items.title: Calculator
items.description: Calculator, for your custom pricing, or to extend your existing pricing.

items.name: container-stagger
items.title: Stagger Animations
items.description: Animated Block with orchestrated stagger animations, for your motion components, the animations are triggered by view.

items.name: distributed-cards
items.title: Distr
items.description: Distributed cards, same as soliter, starts all at one position then animates to its position.

items.name: grid-bento
items.title: Grid Bento
items.description: Bento Grid, layout with multiple variants and displays.

items.name: header
items.title: Header
items.description: Responsive Header, with a logo and navigation links, supporting both desktop and mobile layouts, and toggles on scroll.

items.name: image-player
items.title: Image Player
items.description: Create your own image player GIF/video, with image player component.

items.name: slideshow
items.title: Slideshow
items.description: Display the active image and activate the next image with hovering the text indicator.

items.name: story
items.title: Story
items.description: Simillar to IG story, Story is a component that allows you to display a collection of components in a single view.

items.name: timeline
items.title: Timeline
items.description: Timeline, where you can showcase history (like your work) or a process (like a project).

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Card component with variants.

items.name: card-curtain-reveal
items.title: Curtain Reveal Card
items.description: Interactive card component with open curtain to see content on hover gesture.

items.name: card-flip
items.title: 3d Flip Card
items.description: An interactive card component that flips on hover with smooth 3D transitions.

items.name: card-hover-reveal
items.title: Hover Reveal Details Card
items.description: Animated card with gesture animations,  Reveals hidden content and scale main image on hover.

items.name: card-testimonial
items.title: Card Testimonial
items.description: Card Testimonial, with rating, block quote, and author's informations.

items.name: cards-stack
items.title: Cards Stack
items.description: Stack of cards to showcase a related set of element, like your services, your work, features, process of work, timeline, etc.

items.name: cards-stack-rotated
items.title: Cards Stack Rotated
items.description: Stack of cards rotated by a defined index value to rotate in sequence, it show one card at a time depending on the scroll position.

items.name: custom-cursor
items.title: Custom Cursor
items.description: Turn your cursor into any element your want, text, image, video, or a shape.

items.name: pulse
items.title: Pulse
items.description: Pulse effect for attracting user attention.

items.name: rating-stars
items.title: Rating Stars
items.description: Stars rating component with customizable color, depending on average rating.

items.name: infinite-scroll
items.title: Infinite Scroll
items.description: infinite scroll container instead of pagination, for large lists and fetching data.

items.name: price
items.title: price
items.description: Flexible price component with customizable features and options to display the amount and currency.

items.name: pricing
items.title: Pricing
items.description: Flexible pricing component with customizable features and options.

items.name: product-carousel
items.title: Product Carousel
items.description: Showcase your products with preview image for each product and display your different product colors.

items.name: toggle-layout
items.title: Toggle list layout
items.description: Toggle list layout, toggling between a list and a grid view.

items.name: parallax
items.title: Parallax
items.description: Parallax block, creates a parallax effect.

items.name: scroll-animation
items.title: Scroll Animation
items.description: Collection of scroll triggered animations, Triggering the animation by scroll event.

items.name: scroll-animation-rotate
items.title: Scroll Rotation Animation
items.description: Collection of scroll rotation animations, Triggering the animation by scroll event.

items.name: scroll-autoplay
items.title: Scroll Autoplay
items.description: Displaying different content depending on order and scroll position.

items.name: scroll-x-carousel
items.title: Scroll X Carousel
items.description: Scroll carousel on x axis, with optional progress indicator.

items.name: wavy-block
items.title: Wavy Block
items.description: block animates its children in waves pattern.

items.title: avatar
items.description: avatar component with variants.

items.description: Badge component with variants.

items.description: Button component with variants.

items.title: Dialog

items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Scroll Area component.

items.description: spinner component with variants.

items.name: switch
items.title: switch
items.description: switch component with variants.

items.name: text-flip
items.title: Flip Text
items.description: Flipped text animation, flips the text

items.name: text-scroll-read
items.title: Text Scroll Read
items.description: Text component allows you to read the text by scrolling.

items.name: text-stagger-hover
items.title: Text Stagger Hover
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered effect triggered by hover gesture, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur), the stagger value, and the transition.

items.name: text-stagger-inview
items.title: Text Stagger Inview
items.description: Splitted text animation with staggered reveal triggered by view, You can easily customize by controlling the animation property (transform, opacity, blur) and the stagger value, and the transition.

items.name: text-vertical
items.title: Vertical Text
items.description: Text with vertical display, Can be used as a title or a subtitle.

items.name: text-wavy
items.title: Text Wavy
items.description: Infinite text animation with wavy effect.

items.name: wavy-texts
items.title: Wavy Texts
items.description: Wavy texts wrap, animates a set of texts in wavy motion on scroll.

items.name: word-stagger
items.title: Word Stagger
items.description: Alternative to text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover, in case you have one word or you want more custom text animations, use this component, it is used in the same way as text-stagger-inview and text-stagger-hover.

items.name: animation-variants
items.title: Animation Variants
items.description: animation variants, for your motion components, allows to animate component with transforms, opacity, and blur.

items.name: set-stagger-direction
items.title: stagger direction
items.description: stagger direction, Allow to animate in orchestrated order depending on the order, can animate from the start item, middle item, last item.

items.name: split-text
items.title: split text
items.description: split text utility function, allows to split text into characters, words, returns (characters, words, characterCount, wordCount).

items.name: transitions
items.title: Transitions
items.description: Multiple transitions for your motion components, to animate depending on the animated property.

items.name: use-follow-mouse
items.title: Use Follow Mouse Hook
items.description: As the name suggests, this hook will follow the mouse position.

items.name: use-mobile
items.title: Use mobile Hook
items.description: use mobile hook allows you to check if the user is on a mobile device.

items.name: use-toggle-onscroll
items.title: use toggle onscroll
items.description: use toggle onscroll hook allows to toggle element position on scroll (down hide, up show).
